Skill Notes:

Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Bardic Lore: Can use Bardic Lore to attempt to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Deceptive Worship: Can use Occultism to Lie when claiming membership in another faith
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Root Magic: Talisman given to an ally during daily prep gives +1 on first save that day vs. a spell or haunt
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Combat
Hit Points: 35 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Bard: 17 (charisma; trained)
Armor: None Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Dagger (+6 1d4+1 P/S R10'; strength; trained); Heavy Crossbow (+6 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; trained); Ranseur (+6 1d10+1 P; strength; trained)

Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Unconventional Weaponry (Light Pick): Weapon Familiarity (Light Pick)
Disturbing Knowledge: (2) R30' Successful Occultism vs. Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success also inflicts confused for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts frightened 1 on self
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +7 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 17 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Sure Strike (O1): (1) Self uses the better of 2 attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Uplifting Overture (OC1 Foc): (1) R60' Allows self to use Performance to Aid an ally skill check, with normal failure counting as a success, for 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Enigma: Knows the Sure Strike occult spell
Uplifting Overture: Knows the Uplifting Overture occult cantrip
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Bizarre Magic: Increases DCs by 5 to Recognize Spells and Identify Magic on self spells and magic use
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors:
Bizarre Magic Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and occultism rank (currently 1) >= 3
Disturbing Knowledge Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and occultism rank (currently 1) >= 3
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 6 allocated
